# cmccloudv2_cdn_cert (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# create a cdn certificate, two files `cdn_cert.cer` & `cdn_cert.key` are stored in the current directory
resource "cmccloudv2_cdn_cert" "cert" {
    cert_name = "cdn_cert.cer"
    cert_data = file("cdn_cert.cer")
    key_name  = "cdn_cert.key"
    key_data  = file("cdn_cert.key")
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cert_data` (String, Sensitive) Certificate data, generate example from https://en.rakko.tools/tools/46/
- `cert_name` (String) The name of the CDN certificate
- `key_data` (String, Sensitive) Private key, generate example from https://en.rakko.tools/tools/46/
- `key_name` (String) The name of the private key

### Optional

- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `certificate_type` (String) The type of the CDN certificate, `SSL`, `WARP`
- `common_name` (String) The common name of the CDN certificate
- `expiration_date` (String) The expiration date of the CDN certificate
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `status` (String) The status of the CDN certificate

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
